title: A "Recess" Appointment Leaves Unanswered Questions
summary: President Obama's decision to "recess appoint" Richard Cordray as the first Director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) and "recess appoint" three members to the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) during a Congressional pro forma session has set off a firestorm in Washington.
